translations: 多观众厅电影院，多放映厅电影院

sentences.sentence: Plaza Singapura houses a mix of lifestyle stores, food and beverage outlets and a huge Cineplex.
sentences.translation: 狮城大厦集时尚店铺、美食和饮品店于一身，并拥有一个大型影院。

sentences.sentence: If you want to find life forms that truly seem otherworldly, your local forest is a much better place than your local cineplex.
sentences.translation: 要想找到真正看上去像来自另一个世界的生命形式，当地的树林可比电影院好得多。

sentences.sentence: So before you decide on your wide screen consider the perfect solution to transforming any living room into your own cineplex!
sentences.translation: 所以，如果你决定在你的屏幕上广泛认为完美的解决方案，以改变任何自己的电影院客厅到你！
